creator: florian.bingel@gmx.de
text:
In ant.bat the line: 
if exist "%ANT_HOME%" goto checkJava 
doesn't work, because "exist" only checks for Files, not for 
directorys. I changed it to "%ANT_HOME%\LICENSE", this finds 
the "LICENSE"-file in the directory. Adding "nul" like in the 
checkSystemDrive-Part is possible but opens a file-handle 
that is never closed. 
 
Florian
